Ability.Name: [Misc] Initialization
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Variables & Sanity checks ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- PQInterface is an absolute requirement from now on. if not IsAddOnLoaded("PQInterface") then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffDC143CPQInterface is required to run this profile!|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("|cffDC143CThe profile has been stopped.|cffffffff", "Warning") PQR_StopRotation() end
-- Load LUA data files. if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false
-- Load LUA files if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_Hysteria_Data.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_Hysteria_Data.lua - Make sure it's in your Data folder! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_PQI.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737You're missing PQR_PQI.lua - It's required to run the profile! The Rotation has been halted.|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
-- Let's not continue if we're not in the right spec if UnitLevel("player") >= 10 then if not CastTimer then CastTimer = GetTime() end if GetSpecialization() == 1 then CurSpec = "Arcane" elseif GetSpecialization() == 2 then CurSpec = "Fire" end if GetSpecialization() ~= 3 then if GetTime() - CastTimer >= 4 then PQR_WriteToChat("|cff99CCFFYou're currently specced: |cffb73737"..CurSpec.."|cffffffff!", "Error") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff99CCFFThe profile has been paused. Please change to Frost!", "Error") CastTimer = GetTime() end end end
-- Stop the profile if we're channeling Evocation local PQ_Evo = PQ_Evo local PQ_Invo = PQ_Invo if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_Invo) then if UnitChannelInfo("player") == GetSpellInfo(PQ_Evo) then return false end end
-- Unerring Vision of Lei-Shen check. local itemCheck = itemCheck local visionTrinket = visionTrinket if itemCheck(visionTrinket) == 1 then hasVision = true else hasVision = false end
-- Icy Veins can be glyphed! if IsPlayerSpell(56364) then PQ_IV = 131078 else PQ_IV = 12472 end
-- Cooldown Timer function if not SCDtimer then SCDtimer = 0 end if not SCD then SCD = false end if SCD then PQR_Event("PQR_Text", "Cooldown Mode: Manual", nil, "DC143C") else PQR_Event("PQR_Text", "Cooldown Mode: Automatic", nil, "79BAEC") end
if not SCDtimer then SCDtimer = 0 end if PQI_MentallyMage_ToggleCooldownMode_enable and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyMage_ToggleCooldownMode_key) and GetTime() - SCDtimer > 1 then SCDtimer = GetTime() if SCD then SCD = false PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff79BAECAutomatic|cffffffff", "Notice") else SCD = true PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143CManual|cffffffff", "Notice") end end
-- Variables PQR_ResetMovementTime = 0.3
-- Don't automatically start if we're mounted. if IsMounted() then return true end
-- Don't automatically start if we're dead or a ghost. if UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") then return true end
-- At this point, everything should have loaded perfectly! if not PQ_FrostLoaded then local Hysteria = CreateFrame("Frame") Hysteria:RegisterEvent("COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED") Hysteria:SetScript("OnEvent", HysteriaFrame_OnEvent) Hysteria:Show()
-- Trinket Procs Trinket = 0
-- Living Bomb LivingBomb = 0
PQ_FrostLoaded = true PQR_WriteToChat("|cff91e782Hysteria Frost Mage data is |cff82cee7Loaded!|cffffffff") end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Automatic Buffing
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_FA = PQ_FA local PQ_WElm = PQ_WElm local PQ_ABril = PQ_ABril local PQ_DBril = PQ_DBril
if UnitCastingInfo("player") == GetSpellInfo(PQ_FA) and UnitBuffID("player",PQ_FA) then SpellStopCasting() return false end if UnitCastingInfo("player") == GetSpellInfo(PQ_WElm) then return false end if UnitCastingInfo("player") == GetSpellInfo(PQ_FA) then return false end
-- Frost Armor Level Check if not IsPlayerSpell(PQ_FA) then return false end
-- Buff if we don't have Frost Armor if not UnitBuffID("player",PQ_FA) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FA),"player") return true end
-- Arcane Brilliance Level Check if not IsPlayerSpell(PQ_ABril) then return false end
-- Buff Brilliance if we don't have a Spellpower buff if not PQ_AuraInfo(5,"player") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_ABril),"player") return true end
-- Buff Brilliance if we don't have a Crit buff if not PQ_AuraInfo(7,"player") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_ABril),"player") return true end
-- Make sure our pet is set to auto-attack! if not select(2,GetSpellAutocast(31707)) then EnableSpellAutocast(GetSpellInfo(31707)) end
if PQI_MentallyMage_RaidBuffing_enable then -- Group setting if IsInRaid() then group = "raid" elseif IsInGroup() then group = "party" else return false end
for i=1,GetNumGroupMembers() do local member = group..i
-- Spellpower Multiplier if not PQ_AuraInfo(5,member) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_ABril),member) == 1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_ABril),member) return true end
-- Crit Multiplier if not PQ_AuraInfo(7,member) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_ABril),member) == 1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_ABril),member) return true end end end

Ability.Name: Mage Bomb (Focus)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_LB = PQ_LB local PQ_NT = PQ_NT local PQ_FrostBomb = PQ_FrostBomb local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
-- Disable if disabled in PQInterface if not PQI_MentallyMage_FocusDotting_enable then return false end
if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_LB) then if TargetValidation("focus",PQ_LB) and not UnitDebuffID("focus",PQ_LB,"PLAYER") then if LivingBomb < 3 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_LB),"focus") return true end end end
if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_NT) then local NT,_,_,_,_,_,NTtimer = UnitDebuffID("focus",PQ_NT,"PLAYER")
if UnitExists("focus") and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_NT) and UnitCanAttack("player","focus") == 1 and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus") and not PQR_IsOutOfSight("focus", 1) then if NT then if NTtimer - GetTime() <= 2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_NT),"focus") return true end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_NT),"focus") return true end end end
if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_FrostBomb) then if PQR_IsMoving(0.3) then return false end
if UnitExists("focus") and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_FrostBomb) and UnitCanAttack("player","focus") == 1 and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("focus") and not PQR_IsOutOfSight("focus", 1) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_FrostBomb),"focus") return true end end

Ability.Name: [Support] Frag Belt
Ability.Lua:
-- If we don't know Engineering. Don't activate. for i=1,9 do if select(7,GetProfessionInfo(i)) == 202 then hasEngi = true end end
local PQ_Frostbolt = PQ_Frostbolt local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local Belt = GetInventoryItemID("player", 6)
if not hasEngi then return false end
-- Don't use outside of combat if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then return false end
-- Don't use it if it's on cooldown as well! if GetItemCooldown(Belt) > 0 then return false end
-- Cast Frag Belt on target during Metamorphosis if TargetValidation(PQ_Frostbolt) then UseItemByName(Belt) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end
